poson pun poho dina aagamika wadasatahana bomaluwa wiharawasi pahala thalawe sumanasiri himiyan sanwidhanaya karathi. 6.00 atasil samadanwima, 6.30 buddha pujawa, 8.00 dharma deshanawa kirigalwawe gnyanaloka nahimi, 9.00 dharma deshanawata adala prashna sakachcha kirima, 9.15 gihi deshanaya, shasthrapathi ee.em. dharmawardhana mahatha, 10.30 buddha pujawa, dawal 12.00 jathaka katha deshanawa rajakiya panditha ankumbaure rewatha himi, 1.00 dharma deshanawa aacharya rajakiya panditha karapikkada sobhitha himi, shri lanka bhikshu wishwawidyalaye kathikacharya, 2.00 dharma deshanawata adala prashna sakachcha kirima, 2.45 damsabha mandapaya, sahabhagithwaya , (shri lanka bhikshu widyalaye hitapu mahopadhya, wayambaa palathe pradhana sanghanayaka asgiri maha wiharaye karaka sangha sabhika, shri sumangala piriwen adhyakshaka)aacharya thumbaulle silakandha nahimi (ruwanwali sa pariwenadhipathi)wallagiriye silasumana nahimi, shasthrapathi waduge karunarathna mahatha. 4.00 bhawana wadasatahana, shasthrapathi ipalawa pemananda himi, 5.00 bodhi pujawa meheyawima, shasthrapathi kehelwala rewatha himi, 5.55 sil pawaranaya.
